Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local, #J14 Jeffrey Jump Temporary Reroute at Jeffrey/89th
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local, J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffrey, 93rd, Stony Island, 87th and Jeffrey due to, street blockage near Jeffrey/89th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#15 Jeffery Local, #J14 Jeffrey Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jeffrey, 93rd, Stony Island, 87th and Jeffrey due to, street blockage near Jeffrey/89th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at North/Clybourn. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at North/Clybourn.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
